attributes.action: Allow the child refugee program to continue until 3000 children are helped
attributes.background: My wife's grandma was helped into this country via the Kindertransport, if it wasn't for the kindness of strangers she would have been like many of her family, killed by the Nazi's.  This would mean, no daughter, no Granddaughter (my wife), No great grandchildren, (my 2 children and their cousins)

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
